definitions.definition: A food made primarily of a mixture of raw or cold ingredients, typically vegetables , usually served with a dressing such as vinegar or mayonnaise .
examples: We'd like a couple of cheese salads and two Pepsis, please.

subdefinitions.definition: Especially, such a mixture whose principal base is greens , most especially lettuce .

definitions.definition: A raw vegetable of the kind used in salads.
examples: sandwiches comprising a meat, a cheese, a salad , and a condiment
I prefer a little salad on my burger.

main_definition: A food made primarily of a mixture of raw or cold ingredients, typically vegetables , usually served with a dressing such as vinegar or mayonnaise .
secondary_definitions: A raw vegetable of the kind used in salads.
( idiomatic ) Any varied blend or mixture .
